EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in Borrego Solar. We have adapted our business model to focus exclusively on large-scale commercial and public solar installations, and unfortunately we will not be able to assist you with your project . To find a solar services provider in your area and to learn about local, state and federal incentives for solar, please visit these websites:
http://www.findsolar.com
http://www.dsireusa.org/.
Good luck and thank you for your commitment to creating a clean energy future.
Sincerely,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} 5005 Texas Street Suite 400 San Diego, CA 92108 {!Lead.OwnerPhone} {!Lead.OwnerEmail}
